properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
-PO
1
He ! miposaka ao am-po, Jesosy,
Ny fitiavanao anay.
Efa narovanao fatratra
Ka tratry ny maraina vao.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
He ! faly re (tokoa)
'Zahay zanakao (anio)
Miampy iray (indray)
Ny taonanay (anio) ;
Omeo fo hendry asy fiarovana
Ho taona vao ho Anao Jeso.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ka ny fifaliana
Mitoetra ao anatinay izao
Dia entinay hiderana
mandrakizay ny anaranao
He ! faly re, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ianao Jeso mahay
Mandahatra ny andro iainanay
Ka ny sisa mbola homenao
hahaizanay hanoa tokoa.
He ! faly re, sns.
